        Check if king is in check
        Parameters:

        kingRank - the rank of the king
        kingFile - the file of the king
        Returns:

                                  int file,
                                  java.lang.String myColor,
                                  java.lang.String oppColor)
        Check if king can escape check by moving to another square
        Parameters:
        rank - the rank of the other square
        file - the file of the other square
        myColor - the current player's color
        oppColor - the opponents color
        Returns:
        true if king can escape check by moving to another square

                                                                  ChessSquare kingSquare)
        Get the chess squares along the path of a piece threatening a king in check
        Parameters:
        threat - the chess square containing the threatening piece
        kingSquare - the chess square containing the king being threatened
        Returns:
        array list of chess squares along the threatening path
